skills.name: Spirit of Torpedo Squadron 3 (三水戦の魂)
text:
When [Torpedo Salvo] hits a target, 100% chance to inflict [Flooding], lowering target speed by 50% for 5 seconds.
If this is the first time an enemy ship is inflicted with [Flooding] due to this skill's effect, deal an additional 140% of Sendai's Firepower after [Flooding] ends.
If Jintsuu is in the same battle, increases all of Sendai's damage by 20%.

skills.name: High Speed Penetration (高速突貫)
text:
During battle, everytime the fleet enters Close Range, reduces Fatigue by 10% and increases Sendai's damage by 10% for 10 seconds.
Effect does not stack, can be refreshed.
